1371: Meynolphus was born in Lievevrouwe kerch in 1371.
1381: Lost mother at the age of 10 in childbirth.
Lost mother at the age of 10.
Lost sibling Lucas in 1381 when Lucas was 7.
Hildegardis took care of Meynolphus since Meynolphus was 11.
1382: Lost sibling Erkenradis in 1382 when Erkenradis was 7.
Lost sibling Frethericus in 1382 when Frethericus was 3.
1390: Lost father at the age of 19.
Got married to Lielde at age 20 in 1390.
Meynolphus moved to Cromme straet.D.4 after marriage.
1391: Had a daughter with Lielde, Lielde, at age 20.
1392: Had a son with Lielde, Dauid, at age 21.
1394: Had a son with Lielde, Eltetus, at age 23.
1398: Lost son Dauid when Dauid was 7 years old.
